title: 'SpatialDilatedConvolution' object has no attribute 'bias'
body_html:
• OS:Ubuntu 14.04
  • PyTorch version: 0.3.0 post4
  • How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source):pip
  • Python version:2.7
    After trying load a torch model, I want to print it ,then got the error
AttributeError                            Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-7-02c7391dff0e> in <module>()
----> 3 print(model)

/home/.virtualenvs/dl-py2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/legacy/nn/Sequential.pyc in __repr__(self)
     81         res = res + next + 'output]'
     82         for i in range(len(self.modules)):
---> 83             res = res + line + tab + '(' + str(i) + '): ' + str(self.modules[i]).replace(line, line + tab)
     84 
     85         res = res + line + '}'

/home/.virtualenvs/dl-py2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/legacy/nn/SpatialDilatedConvolution.pyc in __repr__(self)
     84 
     85         s += ')'
---> 86         if self.bias is None:
     87             s += ' without bias'
     88         return s

AttributeError: 'SpatialDilatedConvolution' object has no attribute 'bias'

Since I know I have this layer in my t7 model, but I do not know why I meet with this. could someone can fix this?

body:
- OS:Ubuntu 14.04
- PyTorch version: 0.3.0 post4
- How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source):pip
- Python version:2.7
After trying load a torch model, I want to print it ,then got the error
```
AttributeError                            Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-7-02c7391dff0e> in <module>()
----> 3 print(model)

/home/.virtualenvs/dl-py2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/legacy/nn/Sequential.pyc in __repr__(self)
     81         res = res + next + 'output]'
     82         for i in range(len(self.modules)):
---> 83             res = res + line + tab + '(' + str(i) + '): ' + str(self.modules[i]).replace(line, line + tab)
     84 
     85         res = res + line + '}'

/home/.virtualenvs/dl-py2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/legacy/nn/SpatialDilatedConvolution.pyc in __repr__(self)
     84 
     85         s += ')'
---> 86         if self.bias is None:
     87             s += ' without bias'
     88         return s

AttributeError: 'SpatialDilatedConvolution' object has no attribute 'bias'
```
Since I know I have this layer in my t7 model, but I do not know why I meet with this. could someone can fix this?
